title: balotelli
author: balotelli
content: Do anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?Every day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: I'd say you're spreading FUD rather than discuss about Bitcoin because you're self claimed to have technical analysis but you're wrong about it, we're see Bitcoin price hit $30K now and it's never return to $22K until now.Talking about there's a currency is better, faster and cheaper than Bitcoin is just your random thought.Better in terms of what?Bitcoin is cheap and fast, you only need to spend 6 sat/byte now and your transaction will be confirmed ASAP.Quote from: balotelli on March 17, 2023, 06:34:09 AMPersonally, the development of currency has not stopped at Bitcoin in particular or cryptocurrency in general, but will continue to bring about many other types of currency that are better, faster, and cheaper. Quote from: balotelli on March 17, 2023, 10:52:39 AMBased on my technical analysis, looking at the weekly candlestick chart, this price increase is not sustainable and the bullish momentum is relatively weak. Therefore, it will be difficult for BTC to reach the $30k level. I predict that BTC will return to the $22k level in the next 1-2 weeks.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMDo anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?Bitcoin is available for buyers to buy from sellers at anytime of the day, week, month or year. The supply is limited but it is available to buy and its price and value will increase as the demand is increasing.Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMEvery day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.Why? Because you thought the price will decrease? Or because you thought bitcoin is not what bitcoin enthusiasts said it is? I hope you will not miss the next bull run.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMDo anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?If they're are people like you here in the forum I doubt that they'll be very active in bitcoin discussion board, their main board would be the altcoin discussion board,  politics&society, and off-topic boards. QuoteEvery day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.What's stopping you from purchasing Bitcoin? Why do you bother to check the price of bitcoin when you don't have any? it seems like you just like wasting your time. You just have to spend few minutes on an exchange (Dex or Cex) before you become an Bitcoin holder.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You can never have a deep experience about bitcoin if you don't own some fraction of bitcoin, is like preaching about bitcoin to people without you being a partaker of it, so it makes no sense of you doing that because i believe most people who discussed here are bitcoiners. They are really looking for the best guideline and discussion about the latest happening around the cryptocurrency at large, and you know what that means, you would be eager to go deeper in discussion if you own a bitcoin. For instance what would be your advised to people who are facing difficulty in the industry?

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I personally know of some people who talk about Bitcoin but don't have Bitcoin. A few friends also want to talk about how Bitcoin works but don't have Bitcoin. But they're probably just in the phase of learning, of getting to know Bitcoin. They're just doing it slow. They're busy with what they do so they are not in hurry to do their first purchase. I don't think it is unusual for some people who don't have Bitcoin to discuss about Bitcoin. It is also possible that you used to have Bitcoin and sold them already but you're still interested about Bitcoin and even have plans to buy back one of these days.

comments.author: bussybuddy
comments.body: And what do you like to discuss with it, I'm not sure you really understand it but holding BTC or not having BTC is sometimes not a matter of discussion. However, if you have the opportunity, I think you should buy them because as someone who understands the market better than many others do not know and understand it, you have a better chance of information than everyone else, so don't waste it. I just want to tell you that don't miss the opportunity to buy BTC at a good price, at some point I think the accumulation of assets is large enough and the selection of different investment portfolios, I am sure BTC in this market always offers the best opportunities.

comments.author: laurenB7742
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMDo anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?Every day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.It all depends on your purpose, if you are here simply to spread Fuds, then it is normal for you not to own any Bitcoin. But if you really love it, enjoy discussing it but don't own any bitcoins. I would doubt it unless you're in financial difficulty and can't buy bitcoin at this stage because I've been in the same situation. At one point, I didn't own bitcoin but always enjoyed discussing anything related to bitcoin, I never missed any news about it, simply because one day I will buy it when I have money.

comments.author: borovichok
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMDo anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?Every day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.Follow up daily trending news linking to Bitcoin and the crypto activities was my prime activities for the day, I found interest in it and never doubted that I was going to be a trader. I was in your shoes once, loved anticipating in active conversation concerning bitcoin but didn't got any in my wallet. I was eager to accumulate more Bitcoin but with my tense actions, I learnt to realize that one needs the basic knowledge of cryptocurrency before purchasing Bitcoin. It's funny to talk about bitcoin and not accumulate Bitcoin in your portfolio. But with time, you will be hungered to get pieces of bitcoin when you start witnessing profits made from it.

Lol.I think you are wasting your time if you don't have bitcoins but you check the market every day, are you a bitcoin price based trader? I think that's more likely than someone who doesn't have a job.I don't blame it because I also experienced it so I invited my friends but I didn't have bitcoins that day, I thought it wasn't wrong, because maybe in a situation he had sold his bitcoins or didn't have extra money to buy bitcoins, I tried to have positive mind.But if you deliberately don't have bitcoins even though you have the ability I think you are a great person for rejecting the benefits that bitcoin provides, especially if the price will return to the new ATH, I hope you don't regret it.

comments.body: I think the members in this forum especially those who are always active on the bitcoin discussion board, surely most have bitcoin but of course there are those who don't have btc, maybe to find out about btc and usually a beginner.but if you don't have btc it's your right,but in my opinion it would be better to if you have btc, or plan to buy btc.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Do you not own any Bitcoin by choice or by circumstance? If you believe in Bitcoin at all or at least see it as something intriguing to converse about, and it's within your means to get some Bitcoin for a long-term investment, then why not? If it prices in at any of the possible price points between $200,000 to $10,000,000 in the next 2 - 10 years, then why not have even $10 tucked away? Wouldn't it feel disappointing to be talking and learning about Bitcoin, though having absolutely none if it were to exponentially rise?

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: balotelli on April 11, 2023, 07:26:18 AMDo anyone else not own Bitcoin but like to discuss about Bitcoin like me?Every day, I still read news about Bitcoin and check its price, but currently, I don't own any Bitcoin. Lol.This is not something to be proud of, as a matter of fact it is something that if you do not correct, you will regret heavily in the future. Being a member of this forum and not owning any bitcoin even the smallest amount will be the biggest bad that you can do to yourself. You situation is worse than someone who has never heard about bitcoins because, it is not information that has stopped you, but yourself that has stopped you from making the choice to invest. If it is the money to invest, find a way to overcome that challenge.
